[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","Intro",null,{"children":["$r","p",null,{"children":"React 拥有数百万开发者的社区。本章节将为你列出一些与 React 相关的社区，你也可以成为其中的一员；本章节中的其他页面将为你提供更多在线与面对面的学习资料。"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"code-of-conduct","children":"行为准则 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["在参与 React 社区前，",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/facebook/react/blob/main/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"请阅读我们的行为准则"}],"。我们制订了 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.contributor-covenant.org/","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"贡献者公约"}],"，我们希望所有社区成员都能遵守其中的准则。"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"stack-overflow","children":"Stack Overflow "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Stack Overflow 是非常受欢迎的论坛，在论坛中，你可以提出代码层面的问题，甚至是你工作中的疑难杂症。提问前，请先阅读标有 ",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"reactjs"}]," 的 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/reactjs","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"已有问题"}],"，如未找到你需要的答案，",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://stackoverflow.com/questions/ask?tags=reactjs","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"再自行提问"}],"！"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"popular-discussion-forums","children":"热门讨论区 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"许多论坛是讨论最佳实践、应用架构以及 React 新特性的好地方。但如果你想讨论的是代码级问题，通常 Stack Overflow 会更合适。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"每个社区都由成千上万的 React 开发者组成。"}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://dev.to/t/react","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"DEV’s React community"}]}],"

",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://discord.gg/reactiflux","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Reactiflux online chat"}]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.reddit.com/r/reactjs/","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Reddit’s React community"}]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"news","children":"新闻 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["关于 React 的最新消息，请在 Twitter 上关注 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/reactjs","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":["$r","strong",null,{"children":"@reactjs"}]}],"，同时关注本站中的 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/blog/","children":"React 的官方博客"}],"。"]}]]}]]
